title: Pick Up the Phone
lyrics:
Lyric Otis Lim - Pick Up the Phone

[Romanization]

Pick up the phone
Pick up the shine and we'll never know
Just follow and know
They're gonna sign up and never know

I've got favorite with my baby
gajireonhi noa
I'mma save it all
(oh I'mma save it all)
Take it slow
haneuldo ham ollyeobwa
You sometimes get it figured out

geokjeongdwae?
seoroga gyeote eopseum ama pyeongsaeng solo
Time is too fast
sigani eopseo
geunyang nal anajwo
I don't know what if we think

Sometimes no lie
You wanna take your time
Why do we take our time
You know what? I'mma make you mine
Sometimes no lie
You make it wonder why
I just want my baby
Now I just want my baby
hmm

Pick up the phone
Pick up the shine and we'll never know
Just follow and know
They're gonna sign up and never know

I've got favorite with my baby
gajireonhi noa I'mma save it all
(oh I'mma save it all)
Take it slow
haneuldo ham ollyeobwa
You sometimes get it figured out

Sometimes we try
We're caught up in the vibe
Why do we take our time
You know what? I'mma hold you tight
Sometimes we try
To see the reasons why
I just want my baby
Now I just want my baby
hmm

Pick up the phone
Pick up the shine and we'll never know
Just follow and know
They're gonna sign up and never know

[Hangeul]

Pick up the phone

Pick up the shine and we'll never know

Just follow and know

They're gonna sign up and never know


I've got favorite with my baby

가지런히 놓아

I'mma save it all

(oh I'mma save it all)

Take it slow

하늘도 함 올려봐

You sometimes get it figured out


걱정돼?

서로가 곁에 없음 아마 평생 solo

Time is too fast

시간이 없어

그냥 날 안아줘

I don't know what if we think


Sometimes no lie

You wanna take your time

Why do we take our time

You know what? I'mma make you mine

Sometimes no lie

You make it wonder why

I just want my baby

Now I just want my baby

hmm


Pick up the phone

Pick up the shine and we'll never know

Just follow and know

They're gonna sign up and never know


I've got favorite with my baby

가지런히 놓아 I'mma save it all

(oh I'mma save it all)

Take it slow

하늘도 함 올려봐

You sometimes get it figured out


Sometimes we try

We're caught up in the vibe

Why do we take our time

You know what? I'mma hold you tight

Sometimes we try

To see the reasons why

I just want my baby

Now I just want my baby

hmm


Pick up the phone

Pick up the shine and we'll never know

Just follow and know

They're gonna sign up and never know
name: Otis Lim - Pick Up the Phone
